channel.title: Don't Repeat Yourself on Service Catalog Tools Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Don't Repeat Yourself on Service Catalog Tools Workshop

item.title: Accounts section
item.description: Accounts section As the accounts section of your manifest file increases you can find some duplication. The following sections explain how to deal with this Duplicate account details You may find you have many accounts and OUs with the same default region and enabled regions: accounts: - account_id: '012345678910' default_region: eu-west-1 email: someone-1@example.com name: example account 1 regions_enabled: - eu-west-1 - eu-west-2 - eu-west-3 - us-east-1 tags: - outype:foundational - ou:sharedservices - type:prod - team:ccoe - role:sct - role:account - account_id: '109876543210' default_region: eu-west-1 email: someone-2@example.
